name: Garfields spooky house! (early access)
description:
uh oh! garfield is so damn hungry that he wants to eat you alive so your main task is to find 3 lazzagas to make him not eat you alive! 

READ BEFORE PLAY BECAUSE THERE IS NOT INSTRUCTIONS  TO CONTROL IN GAME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

up arrow- inside

down arrow- outside

3- for a easter egg

there are 2 endings (true end)(false end)
